item.description: Experience Self-Service Analytics Owner Cargill | July 2021 - Present Enable a global community of over 50,000 users to perform data preparation and data visualization using Power BI, Tableau, Alteryx, and KNIME. Set the strategic roadmap for these capabilities and platforms by collaborating with internal stakeholders across the organization, refining the product vision, and supervising implementation of solutions. Partner with vendors to define the best ways to apply each platform to Cargillâ€™s diverse set of use cases.
